messages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?
messages.metadataInputHelp: Enter your source data in JSON format or use one of the sample APIs below
messages.sampleApiHelp: Click on any of these sample APIs to load real data for testing
messages.mappingInstructions: Create mapping rules by selecting source and target fields, then click 'Create Mapping'
messages.selectSourceFields: Select the source fields you want to map
messages.selectTargetFields: Select the target fields you want to map to
messages.noMappingRules: No mapping rules. Create a new mapping rule by selecting source and target fields.
messages.noMappingResult: No mapping results to display. Create mapping rules to see the result.
messages.fieldsDetected: {{count}} fields detected in your data. Click 'Continue' to start mapping.
messages.reviewInstructions: Review your mapped data. You can go back to previous steps to make changes if needed.

steps.step1Description: Enter your JSON data directly, paste from clipboard, or load from one of our sample APIs.
steps.metadataDesc: Enter your source data in JSON format
steps.chooseFieldsDesc: Review the fields detected in your data
steps.mappingDesc: Create mapping rules between source and target fields
steps.resultDesc: View and verify your mapping results

instructions.mainDescription: Follow these steps to map your data. We'll guide you through the process from data entry to final results.

errors.emptyInput: Input field is empty. Please enter data.
errors.invalidJSON: Invalid JSON format. Please check your input.
errors.selectFields: Please select at least one source field and one target field.
errors.mappingFailed: Mapping failed. Please check the following errors:
